name: v0.8.0 - Call Script Optimizer
body:
## Call Script Optimizer

Major release introducing an AI-powered system for continuously optimizing sales call scripts through evolutionary algorithms, A/B testing, and multi-armed bandits.

### Highlights

- **Script Genome** - Structured script representation with modular components (opening, hook, discovery, CTA, objections, end)
- **Variant Generation** - AI-powered micro-mutations with change tracking and lineage
- **Guardrails Pipeline** - Deterministic checks + LLM judge + simulation regression
- **A/B Testing** - Fixed-split experiments with holdout groups and statistical analysis
- **Bandit Algorithms** - Thompson sampling for continuous optimization
- **Canary Deployment** - Safe rollout with auto-pause on guardrail breaches
- **Event Attribution** - Call outcome tracking with provisional/finalized conversions
- **Real-time Routing** - Sub-200ms variant selection at call start

### New Services

| Service | Purpose |
|---------|---------|
| `EvolutionService` | AI-powered variant generation |
| `DeterministicGuardrailsService` | Token limits, forbidden phrases |
| `LLMJudgeService` | AI compliance scoring |
| `SimulationService` | Persona regression testing |
| `ValidationPipeline` | Complete validation flow |
| `ScriptRoutingService` | Thompson sampling bandits |
| `ScriptExperimentService` | A/B testing engine |
| `ScriptEventService` | Call outcome tracking |
| `DeploymentService` | Canary rollout management |
| `ScriptCompilerService` | Genome â†’ prompt pack |

### New API Endpoints

- `GET/POST /v1/scripts/genomes` - Genome management
- `GET /v1/scripts/genomes/:id/variants` - Variant listing
- `POST /v1/scripts/variants/:id/deploy` - Canary deployment
- `POST /v1/scripts/variants/:id/promote` - Champion promotion
- `GET/POST /v1/scripts/experiments` - Experiment management
- `POST /v1/scripts/events/call-outcome` - Event ingestion
- `GET /v1/scripts/campaigns/:id/funnel` - Funnel metrics
- `POST /v1/scripts/route` - Real-time routing

### Frontend Components

- `GenomeEditor` - Module-based script editing
- `ScriptSetupWizard` - Multi-step campaign setup
- `FunnelDashboard` - Funnel visualization
- `VariantLeaderboard` - Performance comparison
